statements: SELECT * FROM employee_engagement WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_level FROM employee_engagement WHERE initiative_name = 'Team Building';
SELECT initiative_name, engagement_date FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 3 ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(engagement_level) AS avg_engagement FROM employee_engagement WHERE initiative_name IN ('Training', 'Mentorship');
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement;
SELECT employee_id, initiative_name FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT employee_id, initiative_name, engagement_date FROM employee_engagement WHERE initiative_name LIKE 'Tech%';
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, engagement_level FROM employee_engagement ORDER BY engagement_level DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score, survey_date FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM hr_initiatives WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM hr_initiatives ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score, survey_date FROM employee_engagement WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS highest_score FROM employee_engagement GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM hr_initiatives WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT initiative_name, COUNT(initiative_id) AS total_initiatives FROM hr_initiatives GROUP BY initiative_name ORDER BY total_initiatives DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement_data WHERE engagement_score > 75;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM hr_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_data WHERE engagement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement_data WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_description FROM hr_initiatives ORDER BY initiative_name ASC
SELECT MAX(engagement_score) AS highest_score FROM employee_engagement_data
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT e.employee_id, e.engagement_score, f.feedback_text FROM employee_engagement_data e LEFT JOIN employee_feedback f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_demographics WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_id, age, gender FROM employee_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT initiative_name, initiative_category, start_date, end_date FROM hr_initiatives;
SELECT * FROM employee_engagement;
SELECT employee_id, engagement_score FROM employee_engagement WHERE engagement_score > 70;
SELECT employee_id, department, start_date FROM employee_demographics WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT initiative_name, start_date, end_date FROM hr_initiatives WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Department GROUP BY department;
SELECT * FROM Survey WHERE survey_score > 80 ORDER BY survey_score DESC;
SELECT id, name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE engagement_score > 80 ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT name, total_employees FROM Department WHERE total_employees < 50 ORDER BY total_employees DESC, name ASC;
SELECT Survey.date, Survey.survey_score, Employee.name FROM Survey JOIN Employee ON Survey.employee_id = Employee.id WHERE Survey.survey_score >= 90 ORDER BY Survey.date DESC;
SELECT Initiative.name, Initiative.start_date, Manager.name FROM Initiative JOIN Manager ON Initiative.id = Manager.department_id ORDER BY Initiative.start_date ASC, Manager.name DESC;
